column4: do you think a wifi card will be automatically recognized or will i have to manually config it?
Can be anything from "automatic" to "completely unsupported".
Do you already have the card?

rt2500 chipsets are well supported. Broadcom support is still experimental, but moving along nicely. Atheros is pretty good from what I've heard. Prism54 cards are also well supported, but hard to get hold of.
